desc: The process of gaining knowledge, skills, and development through learning.
An institution of higher learning offering degrees and research.
example: She is studying medicine at the university.

desc: A person who is enrolled in a school, college, or university.
example: The student passed the exam with high marks.

desc: A set of lessons or lectures on a subject.
example: He is taking a course in graphic design.

desc: A formal test of a person's knowledge or skills.
example: The final exam was very difficult.

desc: A person who helps students to acquire knowledge.
example: The teacher explained the grammar rules clearly.

desc: An educational talk given to an audience or class.
example: He gave a lecture on world history.

desc: A piece of work or task given to students.
example: I need to finish my assignment by tomorrow.

desc: A mark or score showing a student’s performance.
example: She received the highest grade in class.

desc: The study of the physical and natural world through observation and experiments.
example: He is interested in space and science.
